title: 388 7 "Tragedy! The Truth of the Unmasked Duval"Transliteration: "Higeki! Kamen ni Kakusareta Dyubaru no Shinjitsu" (Japanese:悲劇! 仮面に隠されたデュバルの真実) Yoshihiro Ueda Yoshiyuki Suga February 8, 2009(2009-02-08)[17] —
transformers_text: 388 7 Tragedy The Truth of the Unmasked Duval Transliteration Higeki Kamen ni Kaku s are ta D yu baru no Shin jitsu Japanese Yoshihiro Ueda Yoshiyuki Suga February 8 2009 2009 02 08 17 The Flying Fish Riders launch their attack on the Straw Hats Luffy tries riding one of them but ends up underwater Meanwhile Hatch i is freed by Zoro who hasn't fully healed from Thriller Bark Luffy's second attempt at riding a flying fish sees him crash into Duval's room where he sees him without his helmet During a brief fight with Luffy Duval appears before the other Straw Hats where he announces that the man he wants to kill is Sanji who has no idea who he is Luffy then knocks his helmet off revealing that he looks just like Sanji's wanted poster
tf_idf_text: tragedy truth unmasked duval transliteration higeki kamen kaku baru shin jitsu japanese yoshihiro ueda yoshiyuki suga february fly fish rider launch attack straw hat luffy try rid one end underwater meanwhile hatch freed zoro hasnt fully heal thriller bark luffys second attempt rid fly fish see crash duvals room see without helmet brief fight luffy duval appear straw hat announce man want kill sanji idea luffy knock helmet reveal look like sanjis want poster
